thread.title: Re: Video released of Harrison Ford’s near-miss with a 737 loaded with 110 passengers
thread.title_full: Re: Video released of Harrison Ford’s near-miss with a 737 loaded with 110 passengers

author: JosephBloughs ✓Viagrafied
title: Re: Video released of Harrison Ford’s near-miss with a 737 loaded with 110 passengers
text:
— Cuffy (@CuffyMeh) February 22, 2017 
Video has emerged of actor Harrison Ford’s near-miss with an American Airlines 737 at John Wayne airport on Monday. 
Ford, who is 74-years-old, mistakenly landed his yellow single-engine propeller plane on a taxiway. “Was that airliner supposed to be underneath me?” Ford asked the air traffic controller seconds after flying over the jumbo jet with 110 passengers aboard : The FAA is investigating an incident in which Harrison Ford flew low over an airliner that was taxiing at a Southern California airport pic.twitter.com/NmqHtjTVJE 
— ABC News (@abcnews) February 22, 2017 The moment Harrison Ford's plane has a near-miss. https://t.co/LkAX9ZZEoM pic.twitter.com/gSKLdVmArj 
— BBC News (World) (@BBCWorld) February 22, 2017 New footage shows Harrison Ford's recent near miss, flying over an airliner to land on a taxiway instead of a runway https://t.co/2CUiJLbMMs 
— Sky News (@SkyNews) February 22, 2017 Trending
